title: Marissa Mayer STILL hasnt fixed Yahoo
text:
Marissa Mayer STILL hasn't fixed Yahoo 
CNN Money Thursday 22nd October, 2015 
ADSPACE-END --> Yahoo is still a turnaround story -- except it's not really turning around. It's been stuck in transition mode pretty much since Terry Semel stepped down as Yahoo CEO ... more than eight years ago. The company reported sales and profits on Tuesday that missed forecasts. The outlook is weak too. Shares of...
